short_summary: Providing senior organizational design and classification consultant and senior organization development consultant for Competency Based Project Management Initiative
description: Providing two consutlats. One consultant will be more used for design and organization. The other consultant will be needed for developement and organization.
full_summary:
### TSPS - Organizational Design and Development Consultants # W6508-23-SA001

#### Introduction

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites eligible Supply Arrangement Holders (SA Holders) to submit a proposal for the provision of consulting services in organizational design and development.

**Eligibility**

*   The requirement is open to SA Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have been qualified at Tier 1 for the specified categories:
    *   One (1) Level 3 - 1.2 Organizational design and classification consultant
    *   One (1) Level 3 - 2.4 Organization Development Consultant

**TTendered Consultants**

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   4Forward Inc.
*   Deloitte Inc.
*   Ernst & Young LLP
*   KPMG LLP
*   MGIS Inc
*   Mindwire Systems Ltd.
*   MNP LLP
*   PGF Consultants Inc.
*   Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
*   Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
*   8513929 Canada Inc.
*   Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
*   Olav Consulting Corp.
*   Olav Consulting CORP, MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
*   T.i.7 Inc.

**Scope of Work**

The requirement is for the provision of one (1) Senior Organizational design and classification consultant (Level 3), and one (1) Senior Organization Development Consultant. The services will support the ongoing Competency-Based Project Management (CBPMO) Initiative.

**Security Requirements**

*   Level of security: Common PS SRCL #19 applies
*   Minimum corporate security required: Facility Security Clearance (FSC)
*   Minimum resource security required: Secret

**Submission Information**

*   Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the eligible SA Holders who are being invited to submit a proposal.
*   Bidders are advised that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (buyandsell.gc.ca).

**Contracting Information**

*   Contracting Authority: Fifi Kabengwa
*   Phone Number: 343-549-4395
*   E-Mail: fifi.kabengwa@forces.gc.ca

**Additional Information**

*   The
